common.lostConnection: You have lost connection with the server.

buttons.disclaimer: By accessing or using Sonoran CAD you agree to our terms and conditions and privacy policy.

settings.apiIdDisable: You must be logged into a community to set your API ID
settings.secretDisable: You must be logged into a community to retrieve your Secret ID
settings.hotkeyDisable: Hotkeys are not enabled with the free version

text.forgotText: Forgot your SonoranCAD account password? Enter your email below to reset your credentials.

errors.invalidEmail: Error: Please enter a valid email address!
errors.enterPassword: Error: Please enter your account password!
errors.emailLength: Error: Your email must be between 7 and 255 characters!
errors.usernameLength: Error: Your Username must be between 5 and 255 characters!
errors.usernameCharacters: Error: Username may only contain letters, numbers and underscores!
errors.passwordLength: Error: Your password must be greater than 5 characters!
errors.passwordCharacters: Error: Password must contain at least one uppercase and one number!
errors.passwordMatch: Error: Your passwords do not match!
errors.noAuthCookies: Error: Could not load authentication cookies! Are they disabled?
errors.noCommunityCookie: Error: Could not load community cookie! Are they disabled?
errors.browserIncompatible: Error: Your browser is incompatible or has local/session storage off.

text.createText: Register a new community CAD for others to join!
text.helpCommunityId1: Your community ID is a unique identifier for your community. This is what users will use to sign into your specific CAD.
text.helpCommunityId2: Typically, it is the abbreviation of your community.
text.helpCommunityId3: EX: Arizona Serious Roleplay - ID: AZSRP
text.helpCommunityName: Your community name is the public name of your roleplay community.
text.helpCommunityWebsite: Your community website is the URL of your forums, discord, or other website. This field is OPTIONAL and is not required!
text.confirmLeave1: Are you sure you want to leave this community?
text.confirmLeave2: Your account and all data on this CAD will be removed!
text.helpCommunityIdFindHeader: Where can I find my Community ID?
text.helpCommunityIdFind1: You will have to contact a member or administrator of your gaming community.
text.helpCommunityIdFind2: They will give you the specific community ID for their CAD.

tooltips.search: Search for a Sonoran CAD community.

errors.noCommunityID: Error: Please enter a Community ID!
errors.communityIdLength: Error: Your community ID must be between 1 and 50 characters!
errors.communityIdCharacters: Error: Your community ID may only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dashes!
errors.communityNameLength: Error: Your community Name must be between 1 and 50 characters!

labels.emailMe: Email me important announcements, updates, and promotions.

errors.passwordLength: Error: Your password must be greater than 5 characters!
errors.passwordNumber: Error: Password must contain at least one uppercase and one number!
errors.passwordMatch: Error: Your passwords do not match!

text.bundleExplain: Save 30% every month when you purchase a VPS from Sonoran Servers.

characterEditor.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this character?

errors.maxCharacters: Error: You have reached your community's maximum limit for characters

editor.noCustomTypes: No Record Types: Add them in Admin > Customization > Custom Records

errors.nameOrPlate: Error: This record must have a civilian's name or vehicle plate number to be searched!
errors.noName: Error: This record must have a civilian's name to be searched!
errors.noPlate: Error: This record must have a vehicle plate to be searched!
errors.noCopiedLink: Error: You do not have a record link copied!

errors.noRecordTypes: No Record Types: Add them in Admin > Customization > Custom Records
errors.noReportTypes: No Report Types: Add them in Admin > Customization > Custom Records

confirmations.close1: You have set the call status to CLOSED.
confirmations.close2: Are you sure you would like to close this call?
confirmations.close3: This call and all data will be removed!
confirmations.detatchConfirm: Are you sure you would like to detatch from this call?

errors.unitAlreadyOnCall: Error: This unit is already on the call!
errors.noOrigin: Error: This call does not have an origin set!
errors.noStatus: Error: This call does not have a status set!
errors.noPriority: Error: This call does not have a priority set!
errors.noTitle: Error: This call does not have a title set!
errors.attachedAlready: Error: You are already attached to a call!

emergencyCall.confirmRemoveAll: Are you sure you would like to close all active emergency calls?

unitEditor.name: Name
unitEditor.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove identifier

authenticate.authSubtext1: Community owners can request a unique identification key to authenticate their ownership.
authenticate.authSubtext2: This is used for requesting manual changes with a support team member.

communityId.changeSubtext1: Community owners can request a new community ID.
communityId.changeSubtext2: All users in the CAD will need to log out and back in to avoid issues.

customization.customizationSubtext2: Customize your community name, logo, and more!
customization.customizationDisabled: Community customization is not included with your version.

geo.geoSubtext: Cutomize wording in accordance with your community's geographical location.

emails.subtext1: Customize the emails your users recieve when creating an account or resetting their password from your custom login screen.

restrictions.subtext1: Sonoran CAD allows you to limit the amount of civilian characters, licenses, and vehicle registrations every individual user account can create.
restrictions.note: * These limits do NOT apply to communities with Database Sync enabled.

servers.subtext1: Does your community use multiple servers?
servers.subtext2: Sonoran CAD allows you to separate online units and dispatching between multiple servers while still sharing the same records.
servers.subtext3: Your community can currently support up to
servers.name: Name

errors.serverLimit1: Error: Your community is limited to
errors.serverMinimum: Error: You must have at least one server!

errors.generalLimit1: Error: Your community is limited to
errors.agencyExists: Error: An agency with this name already exists!
errors.districtExists: Error: A district with this name already exists!
errors.departmentExists: Error: A department with this name already exists!
errors.subdivisionExists: Error: A subdivision with this name already exists!

modifyDepartment.name: Department Name
modifyDepartment.confirmRemove1: Are you sure you want to remove this department?
modifyDepartment.confirmRemove2: This department and all contained subdivisions will be removed!

remove.confirmRemove1: Are you sure you want to remove this agency?
remove.confirmRemove2: This agency and all contained departments and subdivisions will be removed!

modifySubdivision.name: Subdivision Name
modifySubdivision.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this subdivision?

webhooks.subtext1: Sonoran CAD Discord integration allows you to recieve alerts directly to your Discord server.
webhooks.subtext2: Simply enable and specify a Discord WebHook URL for the desired fields below.
webhooks.emergencyAbout: These webhooks are related to emergency services.
webhooks.unitPanicAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a unit toggles their PANIC status.
webhooks.dispatchAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a dispatch call is added or modified.
webhooks.policeRecordAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a police record is added, modified or removed.
webhooks.medicalRecordAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a medical record is added, modified or removed.
webhooks.fireRecordAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a fire record is added, modified or removed.
webhooks.boloAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a BOLO is added or modified.
webhooks.emergencyCallAbout: This WebHook will be sent when an emergency call is received.
webhooks.civilianWebhooksAbout: These WebHooks are related to civilian services.
webhooks.characterAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a civilian character is added, modified or removed.
webhooks.dmvAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a DMV record is added, modified or removed.
webhooks.lawAbout: This WebHook will be sent when a Law record is added, modified or removed.
webhooks.adminWebhooksAbout: These WebHooks are related to admin services.
webhooks.accountPermissionsAbout: This WebHook will be sent when an admin modifies a user account's permissions.
webhooks.departmentStructureAbout: This WebHook will be sent when an admin updates the department structure.
webhooks.10CodeAbout: This WebHook will be sent when an admin adds, edits or removed a 10-Code.
webhooks.penalCodeAbout: This WebHook will be sent when an admin adds, edits or removed a penal code.
webhooks.apiRequestAbout: This WebHook will be sent when an API request is sent.
webhooks.signalAbout: This webhook will be sent when a signal is in effect.
webhooks.toneBoardAbout: This webhook will be sent when a tone is played by a dispatcher

errors.maxWebhooks: Error: You have reached your community's limit of webhooks:

remove.removeWarning1: Removing or transfering your CAD does NOT cancel any active community subscription.
remove.removeWarning2: You can cancel or transfer your subscription to another community in the payment center.
remove.transferSubtext: You must be the community/CAD owner to transfer this CAD. The transfer process will require email verification.
remove.removeSubtext: You must be the community/CAD owner to remove this CAD. The removal process will require email verification.

wipeRecords.wipeSubtext1: Community owners can remove all saved records by type.
wipeRecords.wipeSubtext2: Select the type below to remove all.
wipeRecords.confirmWipe1: Are you sure you want to remove all of the record type
wipeRecords.confirmWipe2: This action can not be undone!

accounts.purgeConfirm: Are you sure you want to purge all inactive user accounts? (30 Days)

customRecords.lookupPreviewAbout: Show field value in lookup table preview
customRecords.name: Name
customRecords.label: Label

errors.maxCiv: ERROR: This record type has too many searchable civilian sections. (Fields with UID of 'first' and 'last')
errors.minCiv: ERROR: This record type does not have enough searchable character fields. (Fields with a UID of 'first' and 'last')
errors.maxVeh: ERROR: This record type has too many searchable vehicle sections. (Fields with UID of 'plate')
errors.minVeh: ERROR: This record type does not have enough searchable vehicle fields. (Fields with a UID of 'plate')
errors.maxStatus: ERROR: This record type has too many custom type 'status' fields.
errors.minStatus: ERROR: This record type must have ONE custom type 'status' field.
errors.noStatusField: ERROR: This record type must have ONE custom field with the UID of 'status'
errors.noPreviewedFields: ERROR: This record template has no fields enabled for preview.
errors.noName: ERROR: This record template has no name set.

remove.confirmRemove: Are you sure you would like to remove this record type?

integration.apiSubheader: Sonoran CAD's Web API allows you to update unit locations in real time, toggle a unit's PANIC status, generate a 911 call, and more all from in-game!
integration.confirmKeyChange1: Are you sure you want to generate a new API key?
integration.confirmKeyChange2: You will need to update your API key in all plugin or API configurations!
integration.liveMapHeader: Server Events and Integrated Live Map
integration.liveMapSubtext1: Sonoran CAD's live map configuration allows you to instantly setup your community's custom integrated live map, we even handle the hosting!
integration.liveMapSubtext2: Sonoran CAD also pushes event data to your configured listener port.
integration.staticOnlyAbout: If your game mode is not compatible with the Live Map resource, you can specify a website with a map of your game on it instead.

dbSync.dbSyncSubtext1: Sonoran CAD's Database Sync allows you to pull characters, licenses and vehicle registrations directly from your in-game database to your CAD.
dbSync.dbSyncSubtext2: Simply specify your database's SQL connection string and map your tables and fields to Sonoran CAD.
dbSync.dbSyncSubtext3: All RED fields are required. If you do not have a data column for an optional field, just leave it blank.
dbSync.descriptionCredentials: This the SQL connection details to your game database.
dbSync.customMapAbout: This is a custom DB Sync mapping field provided by your custom record editor.
dbSync.jsonColumnAbout: If this column is a JSON datatype, you can specify the JSON key.
dbSync.label: Label
dbSync.tooltipColumn: This is the name of the column in your database table containing this field's data.
dbSync.tooltipTable: This is the name of the SQL table this data column is found in.
dbSync.tooltipCharacterColumn: This is the name of the unique character ID column in your table. Generally this contains the Steam Hex.
dbSync.fieldMapIdAbout: This ID helps maps fields in a custom character section to other records and distinguishes what fields contain search terms like the first and last name.
dbSync.tooltipFriendlyMapping: This allows you to map common DB values to more friendly UI values.

penal.title: Title
penal.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this penal code?

errors.duplicate: Error: You cannot set the Penal Code to one that already exists!
errors.notFound: Error: Penal Code to remove cannot be found!
